sourcesContent:
export const ADD_TO_CART="ADD_TO_CART"

export const UPDATE_CART_UNITS="UPDATE_CART_UNITS"

export function addToCartAction({title ,      
    Category,
    Region,
    Manufacturer,
    Brand,
    Fortress,
    Colour,
    Sugar,
    Grape,
    Serving_temperature,
    Vintage,
    Products_webpage,
    content,
    description,
    delivery,img}) {
        return{
            type:ADD_TO_CART,
            payload:{title ,      
                Category,
                Region,
                Manufacturer,
                Brand,
                Fortress,
                Colour,
                Sugar,
                Grape,
                Serving_temperature,
                Vintage,
                Products_webpage,
                content,
                description,
                delivery,img}
        }    
}







export function updateCartUnits({title ,      
    Category,
    delivery,img}) {
        return{
            type:ADD_TO_CART,
            payload:{title ,      
                Category,
                delivery,img}
        }    
}
